title: Virgin Steele The House Of Atreus Act II Remastered
description:
Hello,

this is a remastered Version of Virgin Steele's legendary "House Of Atreus Act II" Album from 200. It was carefully remastered using High Quality Hard- and Software. There's no clipping, no shitty expanders, no brainless EQ distortion. Just pure, powerful, carefully remastered, metal-music.

I'm an audiophile High-End HiFi Enthusiast, who tries to make good, old, classic Metal music sound more "real", "modern" and "powerful", without using shitty EQ or any sort of cheap Compressors. 

Compression is cancer, so I tried to improve the songs step by step. Of course, there is no clipping.

Give it a try and give me some Feedback if you guys want more audiophile remasters.

Source: CD, slowly ripped with NAIM UnitiServe. NAIM DAC. NAIM Amps. Xavian Speakers. Carbon Cables from Audioquest. Clean, filtered AC.

AIFF, 16 Bit, 1411 kBit/s



Have fun and kick ass!
